      • approxFrFt

        public RGBf approxFrFt(@NotNull
                       @NotNull RGBf Fr,
                       @NotNull
                       @NotNull RGBf Ft,
                       @NotNull
                       @NotNull Vector3f N,
                       @NotNull
                       @NotNull Vector3f L,
                       @NotNull
                       @NotNull Vector3f T,
                       boolean bIn,
                       float n)
        Description copied from class: Fresnel
        Approximate the Fresnel reflectance and transmittance of the surface for light incident from a specific direction.
        Overrides:
        approxFrFt in class Fresnel
        Parameters:
        Fr - (RGBf, modified) The reflectance, which will be set to Fresnel reflectance and be returned.
        Ft - The transmittance.
        N - (vector3f, readonly) The normal.
        L - (vector3f, readonly) The direction of the light. This vector is directed from the surface to the light.
        T - (vector3f, readonly) The direction of the transmitted light.
        bIn - true if the ray is going into the material and false if the ray is going out of the material.
        n - The index of refraction on the transmitted side of the material boundary (normally 1.0 for air)
        Returns:
        (RGBf) Returns the approximated Fresnel reflectance (the Fr argument after the Fresnel reflectance is set).
